item.title: FDA Asks Reviva Pharmaceuticals To Conduct Additional Phase 3 Study For Its Schizophrenia Drug
item.description: Reviva Pharmaceuticals said the FDA recommended a second Phase 3 trial for its schizophrenia drug brilaroxazine after a pre-NDA meeting. read more
